name: General Veers
Lore: 'General Maximillian Veers is the model of Imperial Army officer. Cunning, loyal and ruthlessly efficient leader. In charge of the ground assault troops in Vader''s forces.',
Text: 'Power +1 when at same site as Admiral Ozzel. Adds 1 to power of each Imperial at same Hoth site. Adds 3 to power of any combat vehicle he pilots. On Blizzard 1, also adds 1 to armor and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.',
